desc: A design trend characterized by translucent, frosted-glass effects, soft shadows, and vibrant colors that create a layered, 3D appearance, often paired with gradients.
title: Glassmorphism

desc: A style focused on subtle animations and interactions that enhance user experience by providing feedback, guidance, or engagement in small, delightful ways.
title: Micro-Interactions

desc: A style that emphasizes the creative use of typography as the focal point of the design, relying on fonts, letter spacing, and hierarchy to convey the message visually.
title: Typography-Centric Design
Micro-Interactions
desc: A style focused on subtle animations and interactions that enhance user experience by providing feedback, guidance, or engagement in small, delightful ways.

title: Organic Shapes
desc: A design trend that utilizes irregular, fluid shapes to break away from traditional grid-based layouts, offering a more natural and approachable feel to the interface.
